relation: (Primary Key) Unique ID assigned to boundary.
Age assigned to the time unit boundary.
pageTitle: ETE Database Manual Tables and Fields
title: Time Unit Boundary Table (TU_BOUND)
textBeforeTable: Correlation Tables (LS, LR, SR, PLR, PSR)   Qualitative abundance at a locality (abundant, common, rare, very_rare). c1 Abundance (Foreign Key) integer Locality ID number (Foreign Key) integer Species ID number Qualitative Abundance Table (QUA)   Percentage abundance of a species at a locality. float PCT (Foreign Key) integer Locality ID number (Foreign Key) integer Species ID number Percent Abundance Table (PCT)   The number of quadrats (etc.) containing the species at a locality. integer Quad (Foreign Key) integer Locality ID number (Foreign Key) integer Species ID number Quadrat Count Table (QUAD)   The "minimum number of individuals" (MNI) of a species at a locality. integer MNI (Foreign Key) integer Locality ID number (Foreign Key) integer Species ID number "Minimum Number of Individuals" (MNI)   The number of identified specimens of a species at a locality.

Lower boundary integer (Foreign key) Boundary ID (TU_BOUND) Upper boundary integer (Foreign key) Boundary ID (TU_BOUND) Sequence c30 The chronostratic sequence to which the time unit belongs (e.g., "GSSP" [global stratotype section and point], "Magnetic Polarity Timescale", "North American Land Mammal Age", etc.). Rank c10 The rank, if applicable, in the above chronostratic sequence. Comment c120 Comment on the time unit.
